 1490: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1491: remote_socket_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1492:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config),
 1493:     {error, socket_closed_remotely} = httpc:request(URL).
 1494: 
 1495: 
 1496: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1497: 
 1498: remote_socket_close_async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1499:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config), []},
 1500:     Options     = [{sync, false}],
 1501:     Profile     = httpc:default_profile(),
 1502:     {ok, RequestId} =
 1503: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], Options, Profile),
 1504:     receive
 1505: 	{http, {RequestId, {error, socket_closed_remotely}}} ->
 1506: 	    ok
 1507:     end.
 1508: 
 1509: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1510: 
 1511: process_leak_on_keepalive(Config) ->
 1512:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1513:     HttpcHandlers0 = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1514:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], []),
 1515:     HttpcHandlers1 = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1516:     ChildrenCount = supervisor:count_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1517:     %% Assuming that the new handler will be selected for keep_alive
 1518:     %% which could not be the case if other handlers existed
 1519:     [{undefined, Pid, worker, [httpc_handler]}] =
 1520:         ordsets:to_list(
 1521:           ordsets:subtract(ordsets:from_list(HttpcHandlers1),
 1522:                            ordsets:from_list(HttpcHandlers0))),
 1523:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 1524:     #session{socket=Socket} = element(3, State),
 1525:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 1526: 
 1527:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], []),
 1528:     %% bad handler with the closed socket should get replaced by
 1529:     %% the new one, so children count should stay the same
 1530:     ChildrenCount = supervisor:count_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1531:     ok.
 1532: 
 1533: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1534: 
 1535: stream_to_pid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1536:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(pid),
 1537:     Receiver    = ReceiverPid,
 1538: 
 1539:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config),
 1540: 
 1541:     stop_receiver(ReceiverPid).
 1542: 
 1543: stream_through_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1544:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(function),
 1545:     Receiver = stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid),
 1546: 
 1547:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config),
 1548: 
 1549:     stop_receiver(ReceiverPid).
 1550: 
 1551: stream_through_mfa(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1552:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(mfa),
 1553:     Receiver    = {?MODULE, stream_deliver, [mfa, ReceiverPid]},
 1554: 
 1555:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config).
 1556: 
 1557: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1558: 
 1559: inet_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1560:     MaxSessions      = 5,
 1561:     MaxKeepAlive     = 10,
 1562:     KeepAliveTimeout = timer:minutes(2),
 1563:     ConnOptions = [{max_sessions,          MaxSessions},
 1564: 		   {max_keep_alive_length, MaxKeepAlive},
 1565: 		   {keep_alive_timeout,    KeepAliveTimeout}],
 1566:     httpc:set_options(ConnOptions),
 1567: 
 1568:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1569:     Timeout      = timer:seconds(1),
 1570:     ConnTimeout  = Timeout + timer:seconds(1),
 1571:     HttpOptions = [{timeout, Timeout}, {connect_timeout, ConnTimeout}],
 1572:     Options0     = [{socket_opts, [{tos,    87},
 1573: 				   {recbuf, 16#FFFF},
 1574: 				   {sndbuf, 16#FFFF}]}],
 1575: 
 1576:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], ReplyBody0 = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, HttpOptions, Options0),
 1577:     inets_test_lib:check_body(ReplyBody0),
 1578: 
 1579:     Options1 = [{socket_opts, [{tos,    84},
 1580: 			       {recbuf, 32#1FFFF},
 1581: 			       {sndbuf, 32#1FFFF}]}],
 1582:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], ReplyBody1 = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], Options1),
 1583:     inets_test_lib:check_body(ReplyBody1).
 1584: 
 1585: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1586: port_in_host_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1587: 
 1588:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/ensure_host_header_with_port.html", Config), []},
 1589:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], []),
 1590:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
 1591: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1592: redirect_port_in_host_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1593: 
 1594:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/redirect_ensure_host_header_with_port.html", Config), []},
 1595:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], []),
 1596:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
 1597: 
 1598: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1599: multipart_chunks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1600:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/multipart_chunks.html", Config), []},
 1601:     {ok, Ref} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}, {stream, self}]),
 1602:     ok = receive_stream_n(Ref, 10),
 1603:     httpc:cancel_request(Ref).
 1604:     
 1605: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1606: timeout_memory_leak() ->
 1607:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8739"}].
 1608: timeout_memory_leak(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1609:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 1610:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1611:     Request = {?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html", []},
 1612:     case httpc:request(get, Request, [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}], [{sync, true}]) of
 1613: 	{error, timeout} ->
 1614: 	    %% And now we check the size of the handler db
 1615: 	    Info = httpc:info(),
 1616: 	    ct:print("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 1617: 	    {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 1618: 		lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 1619: 	    case Handlers of
 1620: 		[] ->
 1621: 		    ok;
 1622: 		_ ->
 1623: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers})
 1624: 	    end;
 1625: 	Unexpected ->
 1626: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 1627:     end.
 1628: 
 1629: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1630: 
 1631: wait_for_whole_response() ->
 1632:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8154"}].
 1633: wait_for_whole_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1634: 
 1635:      ReqSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1636:      RespSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1637:      {ok, Server, Port} = start_slow_server(RespSeqNumServer),
 1638:      Clients = run_clients(105, Port, ReqSeqNumServer),
 1639:      ok = wait4clients(Clients, timer:minutes(3)),
 1640:      Server ! shutdown,
 1641:      RespSeqNumServer ! shutdown,
 1642:      ReqSeqNumServer ! shutdown.
 1643: 
 1644: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1645: post_204_chunked() ->
 1646:     [{doc,"Test that chunked encoded 204 responses do not freeze the http client"}].
 1647: post_204_chunked(_Config) ->
 1648:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1649:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1650:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1651:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1652:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1653:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1654:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1655:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1656:         "\r\n",
 1657:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1658: 
 1659:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1660:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1661:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1662:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1663: 
 1664:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1665:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_204",
 1666:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1667:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], []),
 1668:     timer:sleep(500),
 1669:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1670:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], []).
 1671: 
 1672: custom_receive() ->
 1673:     receive
 1674:         {tcp, _, Msg} ->
 1675:             ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg])
 1676:     after
 1677:         1000 ->
 1678:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1679:     end.
 1680: 
 1681: %% Custom server is used to test special cases when using chunked encoding
 1682: custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket, ReceiveFun) ->
 1683:     {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1684:     ReceiveFun(),
 1685:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1686:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1687: 
 1688: custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun) ->
 1689:     ReceiveFun(),
 1690:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1691:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1692: 
 1693: send_response(Msg, Chunk, Socket) ->
 1694:     inet:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}]),
 1695:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 1696:     timer:sleep(250),
 1697:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Chunk).
 1698: 
 1699: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1700: head_chunked_empty_body() ->
 1701:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty chunked-encoded body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1702: head_chunked_empty_body(_Config) ->
 1703:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1704:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1705:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1706:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1707:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1708:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1709:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1710:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1711:         "\r\n",
 1712:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1713: 
 1714:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1715:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1716:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1717:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1718:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1719:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1720:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], []),
 1721:     timer:sleep(500),
 1722:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1723:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], []).
 1724: 
 1725: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1726: head_empty_body() ->
 1727:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1728: head_empty_body(_Config) ->
 1729:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1730:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1731:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1732:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1733:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1734:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1735:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1736:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1737:         "\r\n",
 1738:     NoChunk = "", %% Do not chunk encode!
 1739: 
 1740:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1741:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1742:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, NoChunk, ListenSocket,
 1743:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1744:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1745:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1746:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], []),
 1747:     timer:sleep(500),
 1748:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1749:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], []).
 1750: 
 1751: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1752: chunkify_fun() ->
 1753:     [{doc,"Test that a chunked encoded request does not include the 'Content-Length header'"}].
 1754: chunkify_fun(_Config) ->
 1755:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1756:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1757:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1758:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1759:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1760:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1761:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1762:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1763:         "\r\n",
 1764:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1765: 
 1766:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1767:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1768:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1769:                                   fun chunkify_receive/0) end),
 1770: 
 1771:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1772:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example",
 1773:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1774:     Fun = fun(_) -> {ok,<<1>>,eof_body} end,
 1775:     Acc = start,
 1776: 
 1777:     {ok, {{_,204,_}, _, _}} =
 1778:         httpc:request(put, {URL, [], "text/html", {chunkify, Fun, Acc}}, [], []).
 1779: 
 1780: chunkify_receive() ->
 1781:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 1782:         "Content-Length: 0\r\n\r\n",
 1783:     receive
 1784:         {tcp, Port, Msg} ->
 1785:             case binary:match(Msg, <<"content-length">>) of
 1786:                 nomatch ->
 1787:                     ct:log("Message received: ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]);
 1788:                 {_, _} ->
 1789:                     ct:log("Message received (negative): ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]),
 1790:                     %% Signal a testcase failure when the received HTTP request
 1791:                     %% contains a 'Content-Length' header.
 1792:                     gen_tcp:send(Port, Error),
 1793:                     ct:fail("Content-Length present in received headers.")
 1794:             end
 1795:     after
 1796:         1000 ->
 1797:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1798:     end.
 1799: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1800: stream_fun_server_close() ->
 1801:     [{doc, "Test that an error msg is received when using a receiver fun as stream target"}].
 1802: stream_fun_server_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1803:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/delay_close.html", Config), []},
 1804:     Self = self(),
 1805:     Fun = fun(X) -> Self ! X end,
 1806:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}, {receiver, Fun}]),
 1807:     receive
 1808:         {RequestId, {error, Reason}} ->
 1809:             ct:pal("Close ~p", [Reason]),
 1810:             ok
 1811:     after 13000 ->
 1812:             ct:fail(did_not_receive_close)
 1813:     end. 
 1814: 
 1815: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1816: server_closing_connection_on_first_response() ->
 1817:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on first response."
 1818:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1819:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1820:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1821: server_closing_connection_on_first_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1822:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1823:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1824:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1825:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], []),
 1826:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1827:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1828:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1829:         end,
 1830:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1831:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1832:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1833:     %% Test case assumes at most one reusable past session.
 1834:     _ = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204),
 1835:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1836:     ok.
 1837: 
 1838: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1839: server_closing_connection_on_second_response() ->
 1840:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on second response."
 1841:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1842:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1843:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1844: server_closing_connection_on_second_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1845:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1846:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1847:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1848:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], []),
 1849:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1850:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1851:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1852:         end,
 1853:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1854:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1855:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1856:     %% Test case assumes no reusable past sessions.
 1857:     SendOct0 = 0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1858:     case ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204) of SendOct1 when SendOct1 > SendOct0 -> ok end,
 1859:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1860:     ok.
 1861: 
 1862: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1863: slow_connection() ->
 1864:     [{doc, "Test that a request on a slow keep-alive connection won't crash the httpc_manager"}].
 1865: slow_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1866:     BodyFun = fun(0) -> eof;
 1867:                  (LenLeft) -> timer:sleep(1000),
 1868:                               {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
 1869:               end,
 1870:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE:esi_post", Config),
 1871:                 [{"content-length", "100"}],
 1872:                 "text/plain",
 1873:                 {BodyFun, 100}},
 1874:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], []),
 1875:     %% Second request causes a crash if gen_server timeout is not set to infinity
 1876:     %% in httpc_handler.
 1877:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], []).
 1878: 
 1879: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1880: unix_domain_socket() ->
 1881:     [{"doc, Test HTTP requests over unix domain sockets"}].
 1882: unix_domain_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1883: 
 1884:     URL = "http:///v1/kv/foo",
 1885: 
 1886:     {ok,[{unix_socket,?UNIX_SOCKET}]} =
 1887:         httpc:get_options([unix_socket]),
 1888:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1889: 	= httpc:request(put, {URL, [], [], ""}, [], []),
 1890:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1891:         = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [], []).
 1892: 
 1893: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1894: delete_no_body(doc) ->
 1895:     ["Test that a DELETE request without Body does not send a Content-Type header - Solves ERL-536"];
 1896: delete_no_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1897:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 1898:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 1899:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, _}} =
 1900:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, []}, [], []),
 1901:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 1902:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, [], "text/plain", "TEST"}, [], []).
 1903: 
 1904: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1905: post_with_content_type(doc) ->
 1906:     ["Test that a POST request with explicit 'Content-Type' does not drop the 'Content-Type' header - Solves ERL-736"];
 1907: post_with_content_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1908:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 1909:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 1910:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 1911:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", ""}, [], []).
 1912: 
 1913: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1914: request_options() ->
 1915:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 1916:      {doc, "Test http get request with socket options against local server (IPv6)"}].
 1917: request_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1918:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1919:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _ = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 1920:                                                             [{socket_opts,[{ipfamily, inet6}]}]),
 1921:     {error,{failed_connect,_ }} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], []).
 1922: 
 1923: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1924: def_ssl_opt(_Config) ->
 1925:     CaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1926:     Ver = {verify, verify_peer},
 1927:     Certs = {cacerts, CaCerts},
 1928:     [Ver, Certs] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(false),
 1929:     [Ver, Certs | WildCard] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(true),
 1930:     [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, _}]}] = WildCard,
 1931:     {'EXIT', _} = catch httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(other),
 1932:     ok.
 1933: 
 1934: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1935: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
 1936: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1937: stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config) ->
 1938:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1939:     Options     = [{sync, false}, {receiver, Receiver}],
 1940:     {ok, RequestId} =
 1941: 	 httpc:request(get, Request, [], Options),
 1942:      Body =
 1943: 	 receive
 1944: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, {RequestId, {{_, 200, _}, _, B}}} ->
 1945: 		 B;
 1946: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 1947: 		 ct:fail(Msg);
 1948: 	     {bad_reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 1949: 		 ct:fail(Msg)
 1950: 	 end,
 1951: 
 1952:      inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body)).
 1953: 
 1954: create_receiver(Type) ->
 1955:     Parent = self(),
 1956:     Receiver = fun() -> receiver(Type, Parent) end,
 1957:     spawn_link(Receiver).
 1958: 
 1959: stop_receiver(Pid) ->
 1960:     Pid ! {stop, self()}.
 1961: 
 1962: receiver(Type, Parent) ->
 1963:     receive
 1964: 	{stop, Parent} ->
 1965: 	    ok;
 1966: 	{http, ReplyInfo} when (Type =:= pid) ->
 1967: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 1968: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 1969: 
 1970: 	{Type, ReplyInfo} ->
 1971: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 1972: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 1973: 
 1974: 	Crap ->
 1975: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), {bad_reply, Crap}},
 1976: 	    receiver(Type, Parent)
 1977:     end.
 1978: 
 1979: stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid) ->
 1980:     fun(ReplyInfo) -> stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, function, ReceiverPid) end.
 1981: 
 1982: stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, Type, ReceiverPid) ->
 1983:     ReceiverPid ! {Type, ReplyInfo},
 1984:     ok.
 1985: 
 1986: stream_test(Request, To) ->
 1987:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 1988: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], []),
 1989:     {ok, RequestId} =
 1990: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}, To]),
 1991: 
 1992:     StreamedBody =
 1993: 	receive
 1994: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers}} ->
 1995: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>);
 1996: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers, Pid}}  ->
 1997: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>, Pid);
 1998: 	    {http, Msg} ->
 1999: 		ct:fail(Msg)
 2000: 	end,
 2001: 
 2002:     Body = binary_to_list(StreamedBody).
 2003: 
 2004: not_streamed_test(Request, To) ->
 2005:     {ok, {{_,Code,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2006: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{body_format, binary}]),
 2007:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2008: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{body_format, binary}, {sync, false}, To]),
 2009: 
 2010:     receive
 2011: 	{http, {RequestId, {{_, Code, _}, _Headers, Body}}} ->
 2012: 	    {Code, binary_to_list(Body)};
 2013: 	{http, Msg} ->
 2014: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 2015:     end.
 2016: 
 2017: url(http, End, Config) ->
 2018:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2019:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2020:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2021: url(http_ipv6, End, Config) ->
 2022:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2023:     ?URL_START ++ "[::1]" ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2024: url(https, End, Config) ->
 2025:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2026:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2027:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2028: url(sim_http, End, Config) ->
 2029:     url(http, End, Config);
 2030: url(http_internal, End, Config) ->
 2031:     url(http, End, Config);
 2032: url(sim_https, End, Config) ->
 2033:     url(https, End, Config).
 2034: url(http, UserInfo, End, Config) ->
 2035:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2036:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2037: url(https, UserInfo, End, Config) ->
 2038:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2039:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2040: url(sim_http, UserInfo, End, Config) ->
 2041:     url(http, UserInfo, End, Config);
 2042: url(sim_https, UserInfo, End, Config) ->
 2043:     url(https, UserInfo, End, Config).
 2044: 
 2045: % Only for use in the `mixed` test group, where both http and https
 2046: % URLs are possible.
 2047: mixed_url(http, End, Config) ->
 2048:     mixed_url(http_port, End, Config);
 2049: mixed_url(https, End, Config) ->
 2050:     mixed_url(https_port, End, Config);
 2051: mixed_url(PortType, End, Config) ->
 2052:     Port = proplists:get_value(PortType, Config),
 2053:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2054:     Start = case PortType of
 2055:         http_port -> ?URL_START;
 2056:         https_port -> ?TLS_URL_START
 2057:     end,
 2058:     Start ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2059: 
 2060: group_name(Config) ->
 2061:     GroupProp = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
 2062:     proplists:get_value(name, GroupProp).
 2063: 
 2064: server_start(sim_http, _) ->
 2065:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2066:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2067:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2068:     Port;
 2069: 
 2070: server_start(sim_https, SslConfig) ->
 2071:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2072:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2073:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ssl, Inet, [{ssl, SslConfig}, {content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2074:     Port;
 2075: 
 2076: server_start(http_unix_socket, Config) ->
 2077:     Inet = local,
 2078:     Socket = proplists:get_value(unix_socket, Config),
 2079:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, Socket}]),
 2080:     {Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(unix_socket, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE},
 2081:                                                                   {unix_socket, Socket}]),
 2082:     {Pid, Port};
 2083: server_start(http_ipv6, HttpdConfig) ->
 2084:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2085:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2086:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2087:     proplists:get_value(port, Info);
 2088: server_start(sim_mixed, Config) ->
 2089:     % For the mixed http/https case, we start two servers and return both ports.
 2090:     {server_start(sim_http, []), server_start(sim_https, Config)};
 2091: server_start(_, HttpdConfig) ->
 2092:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2093:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2094:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet_version()},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2095:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2096:     proplists:get_value(port, Info).
 2097: 
 2098: server_config(http, Config) ->
 2099:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2100:     [{port, 0},
 2101:      {server_name,"httpc_test"},
 2102:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2103:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2104:      {bind_address, any},
 2105:      {ipfamily, inet_version()},
 2106:      {mime_type, "text/plain"},
 2107:      {script_alias, {"/cgi-bin/", filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin") ++ "/"}}
 2108:     ];
 2109: server_config(http_ipv6, Config) ->
 2110:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2111:     [{port, 0},
 2112:      {server_name,"httpc_test"},
 2113:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2114:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2115:      {bind_address, {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}},
 2116:      {ipfamily, inet6},
 2117:      {mime_type, "text/plain"},
 2118:      {script_alias, {"/cgi-bin/", filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin") ++ "/"}}
 2119:     ];
 2120: server_config(http_internal, Config) ->
 2121:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2122:     [{port, 0},
 2123:      {server_name,"httpc_test"},
 2124:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2125:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2126:      {bind_address, any},
 2127:      {ipfamily, inet_version()},
 2128:      {mime_type, "text/plain"},
 2129:      {erl_script_alias, {"", [httpc_SUITE]}}
 2130:     ];
 2131: server_config(https, Config) ->
 2132:     [{socket_type, {ssl, ssl_config(Config)}} | server_config(http, Config)];
 2133: server_config(sim_https, Config) ->
 2134:     ssl_config(Config);
 2135: server_config(http_unix_socket, _Config) ->
 2136:     Socket = ?UNIX_SOCKET,
 2137:     [{unix_socket, Socket}];
 2138: 
 2139: server_config(_, _) ->
 2140:     [].
 2141: 
 2142: esi_post(Sid, _Env, _Input) ->
 2143:     mod_esi:deliver(Sid, ["OK"]).
 2144: 
 2145: start_apps(https) ->
 2146:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2147: start_apps(sim_https) ->
 2148:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2149: start_apps(sim_mixed) ->
 2150:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2151: start_apps(_) ->
 2152:     ok.
 2153: 
 2154: ssl_config(Config) ->
 2155:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2156:     proplists:get_value(server_config, SSLConf).
 2157: 
 2158: setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir) ->   
 2159:     CgiDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin"),
 2160:     ok = file:make_dir(ServerRoot),
 2161:     ok = file:make_dir(DocRoot),
 2162:     ok = file:make_dir(CgiDir),
 2163: 
 2164:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(DataDir),
 2165:     
 2166:     lists:foreach(fun(File) -> case lists:suffix(".html", File) of
 2167: 				   true ->
 2168: 				       inets_test_lib:copy_file(File, 
 2169: 								DataDir, 
 2170: 								DocRoot);
 2171: 				   false ->
 2172: 				       ok
 2173: 			       end
 2174: 		  end, Files),
 2175:     
 2176:     Cgi = case os:type() of
 2177: 	      {win32, _} ->
 2178: 		  "cgi_echo.exe";
 2179: 	      _ ->
 2180: 		  "cgi_echo"
 2181: 	  end,
 2182:     
 2183:     {ok, _} = inets_test_lib:copy_file(Cgi, DataDir, CgiDir),
 2184:     AbsCgi = filename:join([CgiDir, Cgi]),
 2185:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(AbsCgi),
 2186:     ok = file:write_file_info(AbsCgi, FileInfo#file_info{mode = 8#00755}).
 2187: 
 2188: 
 2189: keep_alive_requests(Request, Profile) ->
 2190:     {ok, RequestIdA0} =
 2191: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2192:     {ok, RequestIdA1} =
 2193: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2194:     {ok, RequestIdA2} =
 2195: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2196: 
 2197:     receive_replys([RequestIdA0, RequestIdA1, RequestIdA2]),
 2198: 
 2199:     {ok, RequestIdB0} =
 2200: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2201:     {ok, RequestIdB1} =
 2202: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2203:     {ok, RequestIdB2} =
 2204: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2205: 
 2206:     ok = httpc:cancel_request(RequestIdB1, Profile),
 2207:     ct:print("Cancel ~p~n", [RequestIdB1]),
 2208:     receive_replys([RequestIdB0, RequestIdB2]).
 2209: 
 2210: 
 2211: receive_replys([]) ->
 2212:     ok;
 2213: receive_replys([ID|IDs]) ->
 2214:     receive
 2215: 	{http, {ID, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2216: 	    receive_replys(IDs);
 2217: 	{http, {Other, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2218: 	    ct:pal("~p",[{recived_canceld_id, Other}])
 2219:     end.
 2220: 
 2221: 
 2222: 
 2223: inet_version() ->
 2224:     inet. %% Just run inet for now
 2225:     %% case gen_tcp:listen(0,[inet6]) of
 2226:     %% 	{ok, S} ->
 2227:     %% 	    gen_tcp:close(S),
 2228:     %% 	    inet6;
 2229:     %% 	_ ->
 2230:     %% 	    inet
 2231:     %%end.
 2232: 
 2233: dummy_server(Inet) ->
 2234:     dummy_server(self(), ip_comm, Inet, []).
 2235: 
 2236: dummy_server(SocketType, Inet, Extra) ->
 2237:     dummy_server(self(), SocketType, Inet, Extra).
 2238: 
 2239: dummy_server(Caller, SocketType, Inet, Extra) ->
 2240:     Args = [Caller, SocketType, Inet, Extra],
 2241:     Pid = spawn(httpc_SUITE, dummy_server_init, Args),
 2242:     receive
 2243: 	{port, Port} ->
 2244: 	    {Pid, Port}
 2245:     end.
 2246: 
 2247: dummy_server_init(Caller, ip_comm, Inet, _) ->
 2248:     BaseOpts = [binary, {packet, 0}, {reuseaddr,true}, {keepalive, true}, {active, false}], 
 2249:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [Inet | BaseOpts]),
 2250:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(ListenSocket),
 2251:     Caller ! {port, Port},
 2252:     dummy_ipcomm_server_loop({httpd_request, parse, [[{max_uri,    ?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2253: 						      {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2254: 						      {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2255: 						      {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2256: 						      {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2257: 						      {customize, httpd_custom}
 2258: 						     ]]},
 2259:     [], ListenSocket);
 2260: 
 2261: dummy_server_init(Caller, ssl, Inet, SSLOptions) ->
 2262:     BaseOpts = [binary, {reuseaddr,true}, {active, false} |
 2263: 	        SSLOptions], 
 2264:     dummy_ssl_server_init(Caller, BaseOpts, Inet).
 2265: 
 2266: dummy_ssl_server_init(Caller, BaseOpts, Inet) ->
 2267:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(0, [Inet | BaseOpts]),
 2268:     {ok, {_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(ListenSocket),
 2269:     Caller ! {port, Port},
 2270:     dummy_ssl_server_loop({httpd_request, parse, [[{max_uri,    ?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2271: 						   {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2272: 						   {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2273: 						   {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2274: 						   {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2275: 						   {customize, httpd_custom}
 2276: 						  ]]},
 2277: 			  [], ListenSocket).
 2278: 
 2279: dummy_ipcomm_server_loop(MFA, Handlers, ListenSocket) ->
 2280:     receive
 2281: 	stop ->
 2282: 	    lists:foreach(fun(Handler) -> Handler ! stop end, Handlers);
 2283: 	{stop, From} ->
 2284: 	    Stopper = fun(Handler) -> Handler ! stop end, 
 2285: 	    lists:foreach(Stopper, Handlers),
 2286: 	    From ! {stopped, self()}
 2287:     after 0 ->
 2288: 	    {ok, Socket} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 2289: 	    HandlerPid  = dummy_request_handler(MFA, Socket),
 2290: 	    gen_tcp:controlling_process(Socket, HandlerPid),
 2291: 	    HandlerPid ! ipcomm_controller,
 2292: 	    dummy_ipcomm_server_loop(MFA, [HandlerPid | Handlers],
 2293: 				     ListenSocket)
 2294:     end.
 2295: 
 2296: dummy_ssl_server_loop(MFA, Handlers, ListenSocket) ->
 2297:     receive
 2298: 	stop ->
 2299: 	    lists:foreach(fun(Handler) -> Handler ! stop end, Handlers);
 2300: 	{stop, From} ->
 2301: 	    Stopper = fun(Handler) -> Handler ! stop end, 
 2302: 	    lists:foreach(Stopper, Handlers),
 2303: 	    From ! {stopped, self()}
 2304:     after 0 ->
 2305: 	    {ok, Tsocket} = ssl:transport_accept(ListenSocket),
 2306: 	    {ok, Ssocket} = ssl:handshake(Tsocket, infinity),
 2307: 	    HandlerPid  = dummy_request_handler(MFA, Ssocket),
 2308: 	    ssl:controlling_process(Ssocket, HandlerPid),
 2309: 	    HandlerPid ! ssl_controller,
 2310: 	    dummy_ssl_server_loop(MFA, [HandlerPid | Handlers],
 2311: 				  ListenSocket)
 2312:     end.
 2313: 
 2314: dummy_request_handler(MFA, Socket) ->
 2315:     spawn(httpc_SUITE, dummy_request_handler_init, [MFA, Socket]).
 2316: 
 2317: dummy_request_handler_init(MFA, Socket) ->
 2318:     SockType = 
 2319: 	receive 
 2320: 	    ipcomm_controller ->
 2321: 		inet:setopts(Socket, [{active, true}]),
 2322: 		ip_comm;
 2323: 	    ssl_controller ->
 2324: 		ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, true}]),
 2325: 		ssl
 2326: 	end,
 2327:     dummy_request_handler_loop(MFA, SockType, Socket).
 2328:     
 2329: dummy_request_handler_loop({Module, Function, Args}, SockType, Socket) ->
 2330:     receive 
 2331: 	{Proto, _, Data} when (Proto =:= tcp) orelse (Proto =:= ssl) ->
 2332: 	    case handle_request(Module, Function, [Data | Args], Socket) of
 2333: 		stop when Proto =:= tcp ->
 2334: 		    gen_tcp:close(Socket);
 2335: 		stop when Proto =:= ssl ->
 2336: 		    ssl:close(Socket);
 2337: 		NewMFA ->
 2338: 		    dummy_request_handler_loop(NewMFA, SockType, Socket)
 2339: 	    end;
 2340: 	stop when SockType =:= ip_comm ->
 2341: 	    gen_tcp:close(Socket);
 2342: 	stop when SockType =:= ssl ->
 2343: 	    ssl:close(Socket)
 2344:     end.
 2345: 
 2346: handle_request(Module, Function, Args, Socket) ->
 2347:     case Module:Function(Args) of
 2348: 	{ok, Result} ->
 2349: 	    case handle_http_msg(Result, Socket, []) of
 2350: 		stop ->
 2351: 		    stop;
 2352: 		<<>> ->
 2353: 		    {httpd_request, parse, [[{max_uri,?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2354: 					     {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2355: 					     {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2356: 					     {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2357: 					     {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2358: 					     {customize, httpd_custom}
 2359: 					    ]]};
 2360: 		Data ->	
 2361: 		    handle_request(httpd_request, parse, 
 2362: 				   [Data, [{max_uri,    ?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2363: 					   {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2364: 					    {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2365: 					    {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2366: 					    {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2367: 					   {customize, httpd_custom}
 2368: 					  ]], Socket)
 2369: 	    end;
 2370: 	NewMFA ->
 2371: 	    NewMFA
 2372:     end.
 2373: 
 2374: handle_http_msg({Method, RelUri, _, {_, Headers}, Body}, Socket, _) ->
 2375:     ct:print("Request: ~p ~p", [Method, RelUri]),
 2376: 
 2377:     NextRequest = 
 2378: 	case RelUri of
 2379: 	    "/dummy_headers.html" ->
 2380: 		<<>>;
 2381: 	    "/no_headers.html" ->
 2382: 		stop;
 2383: 	    "/just_close.html" ->
 2384: 		stop;
 2385: 	    _ ->
 2386: 		ContentLength = content_length(Headers),    
 2387: 		case byte_size(Body) - ContentLength of
 2388: 		    0 ->
 2389: 			<<>>;
 2390: 		    _ ->
 2391: 			<<_BodyThisReq:ContentLength/binary, 
 2392: 			  Next/binary>> = Body,
 2393: 			Next
 2394: 		end
 2395: 	end,
 2396:    
 2397:     case (catch ets:lookup(cookie, cookies)) of 
 2398: 	[{cookies, true}]->
 2399: 	    check_cookie(Headers);
 2400: 	_ ->
 2401: 	    ok
 2402:     end,
 2403: 
 2404:    {ok, {_, Port}} = sockname(Socket),
 2405: 
 2406: 
 2407:     DefaultResponse = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2408: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\r\n"
 2409: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2410: 
 2411:     Msg = handle_uri(Method,RelUri, Port, Headers, Socket, DefaultResponse),
 2412: 
 2413:     case Msg of
 2414: 	ok ->
 2415: 	    ok;
 2416: 	close ->
 2417: 	    %% Nothing to send, just close
 2418: 	    close(Socket);
 2419: 	_ when is_list(Msg) orelse is_binary(Msg) ->
 2420: 	    case Msg of
 2421: 		[] ->
 2422: 		    ct:print("Empty Msg", []);
 2423: 		_ ->
 2424: 		    ct:print("Response: ~p", [Msg]),
 2425: 		    send(Socket, Msg)
 2426: 	    end
 2427:     end,
 2428:     NextRequest.
 2429: 
 2430: dummy_ssl_server_hang(Caller, Inet, SslOpt) ->
 2431:     Pid = spawn(httpc_SUITE, dummy_ssl_server_hang_init, [Caller, Inet, SslOpt]),
 2432:     receive
 2433: 	{port, Port} ->
 2434: 	    {Pid, Port}
 2435:     end.
 2436: 
 2437: dummy_ssl_server_hang_init(Caller, Inet, SslOpt) ->
 2438:     {ok, ListenSocket} =
 2439: 	ssl:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet, 0},
 2440: 			       {reuseaddr,true},
 2441: 			       {active, false}] ++ SslOpt),
 2442:     {ok, {_,Port}} = ssl:sockname(ListenSocket),
 2443:     Caller ! {port, Port},
 2444:     {ok, AcceptSocket} = ssl:transport_accept(ListenSocket),
 2445:     dummy_ssl_server_hang_loop(AcceptSocket).
 2446: 
 2447: dummy_ssl_server_hang_loop(_) ->
 2448:     %% Do not do ssl:handshake as we
 2449:     %% want to time out the underlying gen_tcp:connect
 2450:     receive
 2451: 	stop ->
 2452: 	    ok
 2453:     end.
 2454: 
 2455: ensure_host_header_with_port([]) ->
 2456:     false;
 2457: ensure_host_header_with_port([{"host", Host}| _]) ->
 2458:     case string:tokens(Host, [$:]) of
 2459: 	[_ActualHost, _Port] ->
 2460: 	    true;
 2461: 	_ ->
 2462: 	    false
 2463:     end;
 2464: ensure_host_header_with_port([_|T]) ->
 2465:     ensure_host_header_with_port(T).
 2466: 
 2467: auth_header([]) ->
 2468:     auth_header_not_found;
 2469: auth_header([{"authorization", Value} | _]) ->
 2470:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2471: auth_header([_ | Tail]) ->
 2472:     auth_header(Tail).
 2473: 
 2474: content_type_header([]) ->
 2475:     not_found;
 2476: content_type_header([{"content-type", Value}|_]) ->
 2477:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2478: content_type_header([_|T]) ->
 2479:     content_type_header(T).
 2480: 
 2481: handle_auth("Basic " ++ UserInfo, Challenge, DefaultResponse) ->
 2482:     case string:tokens(base64:decode_to_string(UserInfo), ":") of
 2483: 	["alladin", "sesame"] = Auth ->
 2484: 	    ct:print("Auth: ~p~n", [Auth]),
 2485: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2486: 	Other ->
 2487: 	    ct:print("UnAuth: ~p~n", [Other]),
 2488: 	    Challenge
 2489:     end.
 2490: 
 2491: check_cookie([]) ->
 2492:     ct:fail(no_cookie_header);
 2493: check_cookie([{"cookie", _} | _]) ->
 2494:     ok;
 2495: check_cookie([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2496:    check_cookie(Tail).
 2497: 
 2498: content_length([]) ->
 2499:     0;
 2500: content_length([{"content-length", Value}|_]) ->
 2501:     list_to_integer(string:strip(Value));
 2502: content_length([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2503:    content_length(Tail).
 2504: 
 2505: handle_uri("GET","/dummy.html?foo=bar",_,_,_,_) ->
 2506:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2507: 
 2508: handle_uri("GET","/space%20.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2509:     Body = "<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2510:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2511:         "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++
 2512:         Body;
 2513: 
 2514: handle_uri(_,"/just_close.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2515: 		close;
 2516: handle_uri(_,"/no_content.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2517:     "HTTP/1.0 204 No Content\r\n\r\n";
 2518: 
 2519: handle_uri(_,"/no_headers.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2520:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2521: 
 2522: handle_uri("TRACE","/trace.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2523:     Body = "TRACE /trace.html simulate HTTP TRACE ",
 2524:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++ "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2525: 
 2526: handle_uri(_,"/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",_,Headers,_,_) ->
 2527:     case ensure_host_header_with_port(Headers) of
 2528: 	true ->
 2529: 	    B =
 2530: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2531: 		"host with port" ++
 2532: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2533: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2534: 	    "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2535: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B;
 2536: 	false ->
 2537: 	    B =
 2538: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2539: 		"Internal Server Error - host without port" ++
 2540: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2541: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2542: 	    "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2543: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B
 2544:     end;
 2545: handle_uri(_,"/redirect_ensure_host_header_with_port.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2546:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2547: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",
 2548:     "HTTP/1.1 302 Found \r\n" ++
 2549: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2550: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 2551: 
 2552: handle_uri(_,"/300.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2553:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2554: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 2555:   Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2556: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2557:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2558: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2559: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2560: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2561: 
 2562: handle_uri("HEAD","/301.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2563:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2564: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 2565:     "HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently\r\n" ++
 2566: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2567: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 2568: 
 2569: handle_uri(_,"/301.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2570:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2571: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 2572:   Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2573: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2574:     "HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently\r\n" ++
 2575: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2576: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2577: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2578: 
 2579:

 2678: handle_uri(_,"/500.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2679:     "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++

 2683: handle_uri(_,"/503.html",_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 2684:     case ets:lookup(unavailable, 503) of
 2685: 	[{503, unavailable}] ->
 2686: 	    ets:insert(unavailable, {503, available}),
 2687: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2688: 		"Retry-After:5\r\n" ++
 2689: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2690: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";
 2691: 	[{503, available}]   ->
 2692: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2693: 	[{503, long_unavailable}]  ->
 2694: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2695: 		"Retry-After:120\r\n" ++
 2696: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2697: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>"
 2698:     end;
 2699: 
 2700: handle_uri(_,"/redirectloop.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2701:     %% Create a potential endless loop!
 2702:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2703: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/redirectloop.html",
 2704:      Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2705: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2706:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2707: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2708: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2709: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2710: 
 2711: handle_uri(_,"/userinfo.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2712:     Challenge = "HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized \r\n" ++
 2713: 	"WWW-Authenticate:Basic" ++"\r\n" ++
 2714: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2715:     case auth_header(Headers) of
 2716: 	{ok, Value} ->
 2717: 	    handle_auth(Value, Challenge, DefaultResponse);
 2718: 	_ ->
 2719: 	    Challenge
 2720:     end;
 2721: 
 2722: handle_uri(_,"/dummy_headers.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2723:     %% The client will only care about the Transfer-Encoding
 2724:     %% header the rest of these headers are left to the
 2725:     %% user to evaluate. This is not a valid response
 2726:     %% it only tests that the header handling code works.
 2727:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2728: 	"Pragma:1#no-cache\r\n"  ++
 2729: 	"Via:1.0 fred, 1.1 nowhere.com (Apache/1.1)\r\n"  ++
 2730: 	"Warning:1#pseudonym foobar\r\n"  ++
 2731: 	"Vary:*\r\n"  ++
 2732: 	"Trailer:Other:inets_test\r\n"  ++
 2733: 	"Upgrade:HTTP/2.0\r\n"  ++
 2734: 	"Age:4711\r\n" ++
 2735: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n" ++
 2736: 	"Content-Encoding:foo\r\n" ++
 2737: 	"Content-Language:en\r\n"  ++
 2738: 	"Content-Location:http://www.foobar.se\r\n"  ++
 2739: 	"Content-MD5:104528739076276072743283077410617235478\r\n"
 2740: 	++
 2741: 	"Content-Range:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2742: 	"Expires:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2743: 	"Proxy-Authenticate:#1Basic"  ++
 2744: 	"\r\n\r\n",
 2745:     send(Socket, Head),
 2746:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("<HTML><BODY>fo")),
 2747:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("obar</BODY></HTML>")),
 2748:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2749:

 2855: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_0_no_length_multiple.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->

 2858:         "multiple packets, ",
 2859:     send(Socket, Head),
 2860:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2861:     send(Socket, string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200)),
 2862:     close(Socket);
 2863: 
 2864: handle_uri(_,"/large_404_response.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2865:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2866:     Body = string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200),
 2867:     Head = io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 404 not found\r\n"
 2868:                          "Content-length: ~B\r\n"
 2869:                          "Content-type: text/plain\r\n\r\n",
 2870:                          [length(Body)]),
 2871:     send(Socket, Head),
 2872:     send(Socket, Body),
 2873:     close(Socket);

 2880:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2881:     send(Socket, "ob"),
 2882:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2883:     send(Socket, "ar</BODY></HTML>");

 2903: handle_uri(_,"/multipart_chunks.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2904:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++

 2906: 	"Date: " ++ httpd_util:rfc1123_date() ++ "\r\n"
 2907: 	"Connection: Keep-Alive\r\n" ++

 2909: 	"\r\n",

 2912:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2913: handle_uri(_,"/delay_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2914:     ct:sleep(10000),
 2915:     close(Socket);
 2916: handle_uri("HEAD",_,_,_,_,_) ->
 2917:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2918: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 2919: handle_uri("PUT","/v1/kv/foo",_,_,_,_) ->
 2920:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2921:         "Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2018 14:39:08 GMT\r\n" ++
 2922:         "Content-Length: 5\r\n\r\n" ++
 2923:         "Content-Type: application/json\r\n\r\n" ++
 2924:         "true\n";
 2925: handle_uri("GET","/v1/kv/foo",_,_,_,_) ->
 2926:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2927:         "Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2018 14:39:08 GMT\r\n" ++
 2928:         "Content-Length: 24\r\n" ++
 2929:         "Content-Type: application/json\r\n\r\n" ++
 2930:         "[{\"Value\": \"aGVsbG8=\"}]\n";
 2931: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2932:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 2933:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 2934:         "\r\n";
 2935: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2936:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 2937:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 2938:         "Connection: close\r\n" ++
 2939:         "\r\n";
 2940: handle_uri(_,"/delete_no_body.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2941:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2942: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2943:     case content_type_header(Headers) of
 2944: 	{ok, _} ->
 2945: 	    Error;
 2946: 	not_found ->
 2947: 	    DefaultResponse
 2948:     end;
 2949: handle_uri(_,_,_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 2950:     DefaultResponse.
 2951: 
 2952: get_stat(S, Opt) ->
 2953:     case getstat(S, [Opt]) of
 2954:         {ok, [{Opt, V}]} when is_integer(V) ->
 2955:             V;
 2956:         {error, _} = E ->
 2957:             E
 2958:     end.
 2959: 
 2960: getstat(#sslsocket{} = S, Opts) ->
 2961:     ssl:getstat(S, Opts);
 2962: getstat(S, Opts) ->
 2963:     inet:getstat(S, Opts).
 2964: 
 2965: url_start(#sslsocket{}) ->
 2966:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2967:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":";
 2968: url_start(_) ->
 2969:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2970:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":".
 2971: 
 2972: send(#sslsocket{} = S, Msg) ->
 2973:     ssl:send(S, Msg);
 2974: send(S, Msg) ->
 2975:     gen_tcp:send(S, Msg).
 2976: 
 2977: close(#sslsocket{} = S) ->
 2978:     ssl:close(S);
 2979: close(S) ->
 2980:     gen_tcp:close(S).
 2981: 
 2982: sockname(#sslsocket{}= S) ->
 2983:     ssl:sockname(S);
 2984: sockname(S) ->
 2985:     inet:sockname(S).
 2986: 
 2987: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body) ->
 2988:     receive
 2989: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 2990: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 2991: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>);
 2992: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 2993: 	    Body;
 2994: 	{http, Msg} ->
 2995: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 2996:     end.
 2997: 
 2998: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body, Pid) ->
 2999:     httpc:stream_next(Pid),
 3000:     ct:print("~p:receive_streamed_body -> requested next stream ~n", [?MODULE]),
 3001:     receive
 3002: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 3003: 	    %% Make sure the httpc hasn't sent us the next 'stream'
 3004: 	    %% without our request.
 3005: 	    receive
 3006: 		{http, {RequestId, stream, _}} = Msg ->
 3007: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_flood_of_stream, Msg})
 3008: 	    after
 3009: 		1000 ->
 3010: 		    ok
 3011: 	    end,
 3012: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 3013: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>,
 3014: 				  Pid);
 3015: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 3016: 	    Body;
 3017: 	{http, Msg} ->
 3018: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 3019:     end.
 3020: 
 3021: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3022: %% A sequence number handler
 3023: %% The purpose is to be able to pair requests with responses.
 3024: 
 3025: start_sequence_number_server() ->
 3026:     proc_lib:spawn(fun() -> loop_sequence_number(1) end).
 3027: 
 3028: loop_sequence_number(N) ->
 3029:     receive
 3030: 	shutdown ->
 3031: 	    ok;
 3032: 	{From, get_next} ->
 3033: 	    From ! {next_is, N},
 3034: 	    loop_sequence_number(N + 1)
 3035:     end.
 3036: 
 3037: get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer) ->
 3038:     SeqNumServer ! {self(), get_next},
 3039:     receive {next_is, N} -> N end.
 3040: 
 3041: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3042: %% Client part
 3043: %% Sends requests randomly parallel
 3044: 
 3045: run_clients(NumClients, ServerPort, SeqNumServer) ->
 3046:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3047:     set_random_seed(),
 3048:     lists:map(
 3049:       fun(Id) ->
 3050: 	      Req = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("req~3..0w", [get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer)])),
 3051: 	      Url = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(ServerPort) ++  "/" ++ Req,
 3052: 	      Pid = proc_lib:spawn(
 3053: 		      fun() ->
 3054: 			      case httpc:request(Url) of
 3055: 				  {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, Resp}} ->
 3056: 				      ct:print("[~w] 200 response: "
 3057: 					       "~p~n", [Id, Resp]),
 3058: 				      case lists:prefix(Req++"->", Resp) of
 3059: 					  true -> exit(normal);
 3060: 					  false -> exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp})
 3061: 				      end;
 3062: 				  {ok, {{_,EC,Reason},_,Resp}}  ->
 3063: 				      ct:print("[~w] ~w response: "
 3064: 					       "~s~n~s~n",
 3065: 					       [Id, EC, Reason, Resp]),
 3066: 				      exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp});
 3067: 				  Crap ->
 3068: 				      ct:print("[~w] bad response: ~p",
 3069: 					       [Id, Crap]),
 3070: 				      exit({bad_resp, Req, Crap})
 3071: 			      end
 3072: 		      end),
 3073: 	      MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3074: 	      timer:sleep(10 + rand:uniform(1334)),
 3075: 	      {Id, Pid, MRef}
 3076:       end,
 3077:       lists:seq(1, NumClients)).
 3078: 
 3079: wait4clients([], _Timeout) ->
 3080:     ok;
 3081: wait4clients(Clients, Timeout) when Timeout > 0 ->
 3082:     Time = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 3083: 
 3084:     receive
 3085: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, normal} ->
 3086: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3087: 	    NewClients = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, Clients),
 3088: 	    wait4clients(NewClients, Timeout - inets_lib:millisec_passed(Time));
 3089: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3090: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3091: 	    ct:fail({bad_client_termination, Id, Reason})
 3092:     after Timeout ->
 3093: 	    ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients})
 3094:     end;
 3095: wait4clients(Clients, _) ->
 3096:     ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients}).
 3097: 
 3098: 
 3099: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3100: %% Webserver part:
 3101: %% Implements a web server that sends responses one character
 3102: %% at a time, with random delays between the characters.
 3103: 
 3104: start_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3105:     proc_lib:start(
 3106:       erlang, apply, [fun() -> init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) end, []]).
 3107: 
 3108: init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3109:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3110:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet,0}, {active,true},
 3111: 				     {backlog, 100}]),
 3112:     {ok, {_IP, Port}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 3113:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self(), Port}),
 3114:     loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer).
 3115: 
 3116: loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3117:     Master = self(),
 3118:     Acceptor = proc_lib:spawn(
 3119: 		 fun() -> client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) end),
 3120:     receive
 3121: 	{accepted, Acceptor} ->
 3122: 	    loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer);
 3123: 	shutdown ->
 3124: 	    gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 3125: 	    exit(Acceptor, kill)
 3126:     end.
 3127: 
 3128: 
 3129: %% Handle one client connection
 3130: client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3131:     {ok, CSock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 3132:     Master ! {accepted, self()},
 3133:     set_random_seed(),
 3134:     loop_client(1, CSock, SeqNumServer).
 3135: 
 3136: loop_client(N, CSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3137:     %% Await request, don't bother parsing it too much,
 3138:     %% assuming the entire request arrives in one packet.
 3139:     receive
 3140: 	{tcp, CSock, Req} ->
 3141: 	    ReqNum = parse_req_num(Req),
 3142: 	    RespSeqNum = get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer),
 3143: 	    Response = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~s->resp~3..0w/~2..0w", [ReqNum, RespSeqNum, N])),
 3144: 	    Txt = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Slow server (~p) got ~p, answering with ~p",
 3145: 					      [self(), Req, Response])),
 3146: 	    ct:print("~s...~n", [Txt]),
 3147: 	    slowly_send_response(CSock, Response),
 3148: 	    case parse_connection_type(Req) of
 3149: 		keep_alive ->
 3150: 		    ct:print("~s...done~n", [Txt]),
 3151: 		    loop_client(N+1, CSock, SeqNumServer);
 3152: 		close ->
 3153: 		    ct:print("~s...done (closing)~n", [Txt]),
 3154: 		    gen_tcp:close(CSock)
 3155: 	    end
 3156:     end.
 3157: 
 3158: slowly_send_response(CSock, Answer) ->
 3159:     Response =  lists:flatten(io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-Length: ~w\r\n\r\n~s",
 3160: 					    [length(Answer), Answer])),
 3161:     lists:foreach(
 3162:       fun(Char) ->
 3163: 	      timer:sleep(rand:uniform(500)),
 3164: 	      gen_tcp:send(CSock, <<Char>>)
 3165:       end,
 3166:       Response).
 3167: 
 3168: parse_req_num(Request) ->
 3169:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3170:     {match, [ReqNum]} = re:run(Request, "GET /(.*) HTTP", Opts),
 3171:     ReqNum.
 3172: 
 3173: parse_connection_type(Request) ->
 3174:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3175:     {match,[CType]} = re:run(Request, "connection: *(keep-alive|close)", Opts),
 3176:     case string:to_lower(CType) of
 3177: 	"close" -> close;
 3178: 	"keep-alive" -> keep_alive
 3179:     end.
 3180: 
 3181: set_random_seed() ->
 3182:     Unique = erlang:unique_integer(),
 3183:     A = erlang:phash2([make_ref(), self(), Unique]),
 3184:     rand:seed(exsplus, {A, A, A}).
 3185: 
 3186: 
 3187: otp_8739(doc) ->
 3188:     ["OTP-8739"];
 3189: otp_8739(suite) ->
 3190:     [];
 3191: otp_8739(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3192:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 3193:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3194:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 3195:     Method      = get,
 3196:     Request     = {URL, []},
 3197:     HttpOptions = [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}],
 3198:     Options     = [{sync, true}],
 3199:     case httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOptions, Options) of
 3200: 	{error, timeout} ->
 3201: 	    %% And now we check the size of the handler db
 3202: 	    Info = httpc:info(),
 3203: 	    ct:print("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 3204: 	    {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 3205: 		lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 3206: 	    case Handlers of
 3207: 		[] ->
 3208: 		    ok;
 3209: 		_ ->
 3210: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers})
 3211: 	    end;
 3212: 	Unexpected ->
 3213: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 3214:     end.
 3215: 
 3216: otp_8739_dummy_server() ->
 3217:     Parent = self(),
 3218:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) end),
 3219:     receive
 3220: 	{port, Port} ->
 3221: 	    {Pid, Port}
 3222:     end.
 3223: 
 3224: otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) ->
 3225:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3226:     {ok, ListenSocket} =
 3227: 	gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet, 0},
 3228: 			   {reuseaddr,true},
 3229: 			   {active, false}]),
 3230:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(ListenSocket),
 3231:     Parent ! {port, Port},
 3232:     otp_8739_dummy_server_main(Parent, ListenSocket).
 3233: 
 3234: otp_8739_dummy_server_main(_Parent, ListenSocket) ->
 3235:     case gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket) of
 3236: 	{ok, Sock} ->
 3237: 	    %% Ignore the request, and simply wait for the socket to close
 3238: 	    receive
 3239: 		{tcp_closed, Sock} ->
 3240: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3241: 		    exit(normal);
 3242: 		{tcp_error, Sock, Reason} ->
 3243: 		    ct:fail("socket error: ~p", [Reason]),
 3244: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3245: 		    exit(normal)
 3246: 	    after 10000 ->
 3247: 		    %% Just in case
 3248: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 3249: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3250: 		    exit(timeout)
 3251: 	    end;
 3252: 	Error ->
 3253: 	    exit(Error)
 3254:     end.
 3255: 
 3256: send_multipart_chunks(Socket) ->
 3257:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("--chunk_boundary\r\n")),
 3258:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("Content-Type: text/plain\r\nContent-Length: 4\r\n\r\n")),
 3259:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("test\r\n")),
 3260:     ct:sleep(500),
 3261:     send_multipart_chunks(Socket).
 3262: 
 3263: receive_stream_n(_, 0) ->
 3264:     ok;
 3265: receive_stream_n(Ref, N) ->
 3266:     receive
 3267: 	{http, {Ref, stream_start, _}} ->
 3268: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N);
 3269: 	{http, {Ref,stream, Data}} ->
 3270: 	    ct:pal("Data:  ~p", [Data]),
 3271: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N-1)
 3272:     end.
 3273: 
 3274: is_ipv6_supported() ->
 3275:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 3276:     try 
 3277:         lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts))
 3278:     catch
 3279:          _: _ ->
 3280:             false
 3281:     end.
